Firewall_Address_List.title: Firewall_Address_List
Firewall_Address_List.description: Declares an address-list for use by firewall rules. An address list is a list of IP-address prefixes to compare against the source-IP address and/or destination-IP address in an IP packet

addresses.description: A list of IPv4 and IPv6 addresses and address ranges. You can specify a network with CIDR slash notation.

addressDiscovery.title: Address discovery
addressDiscovery.description: Selects how server (node) addresses are discovered

fqdns.description: A list of fully qualified domain names.

geo.description: A list of geographic locations (for example, US:Washington).

addressLists.description: A list of other address lists (each by BIG-IP AS3 pointer or BIG-IP pathname).

Firewall_Port_List.title: Firewall_Port_List
Firewall_Port_List.description: Declares a port-list for use by firewall rules. A firewall rule can match a packet's source port or destination port against one of the ports in a port list, and can take some action (such as ACCEPT or DROP) for a matching packet.

ports.description: A list of ports and port ranges (for example, 80, "8080-8090").

portLists.description: A list of other port lists (each by BIG-IP AS3 pointer or BIG-IP pathname).

use.title: Use
use.description: BIG-IP AS3 pointer to firewall port list declaration

bigip.title: BIG-IP Firewall Port List
bigip.description: Pathname of existing BIG-IP firewall port list

Firewall_Rule_List.title: Firewall_Rule_List
Firewall_Rule_List.description: Declares a list of network firewall rules. You can reuse a rule list in multiple firewalls, such as the firewalls for self IPs, routing domains, and the global firewall.

rules.description: A list of network firewall rules.

name.description: The name of the firewall rule.

action.description: Specifies the action that the firewall rule will take on matching packets.

protocol.description: Specifies the protocol to which the firewall rule applies

loggingEnabled.description: Specifies whether the system enables or disables logging for the firewall rule.

iRule.description: Specifies the name of the iRule (by BIG-IP AS3 pointer or BIG-IP pathname) that the system will trigger when a packet matches the firewall rule.

use.title: Use
use.description: BIG-IP AS3 pointer to iRule declaration

iRuleSampleRate.description: Specifies the rate at which the system will trigger the specified iRule when a packet matches this firewall rule. The default value is 1 and causes the system to trigger the iRule for every packet that matches. A value of 0 disables iRule triggering.

Firewall_Rule_Source.title: Firewall Rule Source
Firewall_Rule_Source.description: Declares the packet sources to which the network firewall rule applies.

addressLists.description: A list of address lists (each by BIG-IP AS3 pointer or BIG-IP pathname).

portLists.description: A list of port lists (each by BIG-IP AS3 pointer or BIG-IP pathname).

use.title: Use
use.description: BIG-IP AS3 pointer to firewall port list declaration

bigip.title: BIG-IP Firewall Port List
bigip.description: Pathname of existing BIG-IP firewall port list

vlans.description: A list of VLANs by BIG-IP pathname

addresses.description: A list of IPv4 and IPv6 addresses and address ranges. You can specify a network with CIDR slash notation.

ports.description: A list of ports and port ranges.

Firewall_Rule_Destination.title: Firewall Rule Destination
Firewall_Rule_Destination.description: Declares the packet destinations to which the network firewall rule applies.

addressLists.description: A list of address lists (each by BIG-IP AS3 pointer or BIG-IP pathname).

portLists.description: A list of port lists (each by BIG-IP AS3 pointer or BIG-IP pathname).

use.title: Use
use.description: BIG-IP AS3 pointer to firewall port list declaration

bigip.title: BIG-IP Firewall Port List
bigip.description: Pathname of existing BIG-IP firewall port list

addresses.description: A list of IPv4 and IPv6 addresses and address ranges. You can specify a network with CIDR slash notation.

ports.description: A list of ports and port ranges.

rules.description: A list of firewall policy rules

routeDomainEnforcement.description: Specifies Route Domains to enforce this policy on. Rules of this policy will be enforced on the Route Domains. If setting this property, the Firewall_Policy must be defined in /Common/Shared.

protocol.description: Specifies the IP protocol against which the packet will be compared

addressLists.description: A list of address lists (each by BIG-IP AS3 pointer or BIG-IP pathname)

portLists.description: A list of port lists (each by BIG-IP AS3 pointer or BIG-IP pathname)

use.title: Use
use.description: BIG-IP AS3 pointer to firewall port list declaration

bigip.title: BIG-IP Firewall Port List
bigip.description: Pathname of existing BIG-IP firewall port list

addressLists.description: A list of address lists (each by BIG-IP AS3 pointer or BIG-IP pathname)

portLists.description: A list of port lists (each by BIG-IP AS3 pointer or BIG-IP pathname)

use.title: Use
use.description: BIG-IP AS3 pointer to firewall port list declaration

bigip.title: BIG-IP Firewall Port List
bigip.description: Pathname of existing BIG-IP firewall port list

NAT_Source_Translation.title: NAT_Source_Translation
NAT_Source_Translation.description: Configures a Security network address translation source translation object

addresses.description: Specifies addresses on which source translation is performed

allowEgressInterfaces.description: Specifies the egress interfaces (tunnels and VLANs) on which source translation is allowed

clientConnectionLimit.description: Maximum number of simultaneous translated connections a client or subscriber is allowed to have

disallowEgressInterfaces.description: Specifies the egress interfaces (tunnels and VLANs) on which source translation is not allowed

hairpinModeEnabled.description: Enables or disables hairpinning for incoming connections to active translation end-points

inboundMode.description: Specifies the persistence settings for NAT translation entries

patMode.description: Specifies whether the translation address mapping is performed in Network Address Port Translation mode, Deterministic mode, or in Port Block Allocation mode

ports.description: Specifies source ports and port ranges on which source translation is performed

routeAdvertisement.description: Specifies that the traffic is advertised to dynamic routing protocols configured in the route domain

type.description: Specifies the type of source translation item

excludeAddresses.description: Specifies the set of addresses excluded from translation IP addresses available in the pool. This property is available on BIGIP 14.1 and above.

NAT_Source_Translation_Mapping.description: Configure the mapping settings for translation entries. It is the preservation of a public-side IP address for a client from session to session. Only available if type is dynamic-pat.

mode.description: Specifies the mapping mode for translation entries

timeout.description: Specifies the timeout (in seconds) for address and port mapping

blockIdleTimeout.description: Specifies the amount of time in seconds that an assigned block of ports remains available when idle before it times out

blockLifetime.description: Specifies the lifetime in seconds of a block of ports

blockSize.description: Specifies the number of ports per block.  Each block is assigned to one client.  A client can use all ports in a block multiplied by the number of blocks, up to the connection limit, if one is set

clientBlockLimit.description: Specifies the number of blocks that can be assigned to a client

zombieTimeout.description: Specifies the timeout duration for a zombie port block, which is a timed out port block with one or more active connections

Protocol_Inspection_Profile.title: Protocol_Inspection_Profile
Protocol_Inspection_Profile.description: Protocol Inspection Profile used for configurable BIG-IP AFM intrusion prevention

collectAVRStats.description: If true, AVR will collect data from the intrusion prevention profile

enableComplianceChecks.description: Specifies whether the compliance checks will be enabled for this profile

enableSignatureChecks.description: Specifies whether the signature checks will be enabled for this profile

autoAddNewInspections.description: Specifies whether new inspections delivered via IPS IM package will be automatically added to this profile

autoPublish.description: Specifies whether the inspections will be automatically updated to the suggested action after the staging period

defaultFromProfile.description: Specifies the parent profile. If specified, the new profile will be cloned from the parent

services.description: Specifies the services and service checks for this profile

type.description: The name of the service type

compliance.description: A list of compliance checks to attach to the Protocol Inspection Profile

signature.description: A list of signature checks to attach to the Protocol Inspection Profile

ports.description: List of ports to attach to the service.

Protocol_Inspection_Profile_Service_Comp.title: Protocol Inspection Profile Service Compliance Check
Protocol_Inspection_Profile_Service_Comp.description: Defines a compliance check to attach to the Protocol Inspection Profile

action.description: Which action to perform on traffic matching the check

log.description: Specifies whether to log the check

value.description: Value to use for the check. If a check accepts enumerable values, these should be delimited by spaces.

Protocol_Inspection_Profile_Service_Sign.title: Protocol Inspection Profile Service Signature Check
Protocol_Inspection_Profile_Service_Sign.description: Defines a signature check to attach to the Protocol Inspection Profile

action.description: Which action to perform on traffic matching the check

log.description: Specifies whether to log the check

SSH_Proxy_Profile.title: SSH_Proxy_Profile
SSH_Proxy_Profile.description: SSH Profile used for SSH security

sshProfileAuthInfo.description: Specifies the authentication info of public and private keys for this profile

sshProfileRuleSet.description: The profile's collection of rules, each rule holds a set of actions

SSH_Proxy_Profile_Auth_Info_Collection.description: A collection of authentication info of public and private keys

name.description: The name of this set of Authorized Info

SSH_Proxy_Profile_Proxy_Auth_Info.description: The keys used to authenticate ssh connections between the big-ip and external sources

privateKey.description: The private key of the authentication algorithm (rsa, dss, etc...)

allowReuse.description: If true, other declaration objects may reuse this value

publicKey.description: The public key of the authentication algorithm (rsa, dss, etc...)

SSH_Proxy_Profile_Real_Server_Auth_Info.description: Public key that can be used to authenticate real host server to the proxy

publicKey.description: The public key of the authentication algorithm (rsa, dss, etc...)

SSH_Proxy_Profile_Default_Action_Collect.description: A collection of actions for the SSH Profile

name.description: The name of this set of actions

SSH_Proxy_Profile_Default_Action.description: The action an SSH Profile will take. The default value is 'allow'.

control.description: Indicates the specific action to take

log.description: Indicates if a log will be created when the action is taken. The default value is false.

name.description: The name of this set of rules

sshProfileRuleActions.description: The sets of actions in the rule

SSH_Proxy_Profile_Rule_Action_Collection.description: A collection of actions for the SSH Profile

name.description: The name of this set of actions

SSH_Proxy_Profile_Rule_Action.description: The action an SSH Profile Rule will take. The default value is 'unspecified'.

control.description: Indicates the specific action to take

log.description: Indicates if a log will be created when the action is taken. The default value is false.

Ping_Access_Agent_Properties.title: Ping_Access_Agent_Properties
Ping_Access_Agent_Properties.description: Ping access agent properties used for ping access

ignoreChanges.title: Ignore changes
ignoreChanges.description: If false (default), the system updates the ping access agent properties in every BIG-IP AS3 declaration deployment. If true, BIG-IP AS3 creates the properties on first deployment, and leaves it untouched afterwards

pingAccessProperties.description: Specifies the name of the Ping Access Properties (by BIG-IP AS3 pointer or BIG-IP pathname)

use.title: Use
use.description: BIG-IP AS3 pointer to Ping Access Properties

bigip.title: BIG-IP Ping Access Agent Properties
bigip.description: Pathname of existing BIG-IP Ping Access Properties

pool.description: Specifies the name of the Pool (by BIG-IP AS3 pointer or BIG-IP pathname)

use.title: Use
use.description: BIG-IP AS3 pointer to Pool declaration

useHTTPS.title: use HTTPS
useHTTPS.description: If true, use server SSL profile else ignore

serversslProfile.description: Specifies the name of the server ssl profile (by BIG-IP AS3 pointer or BIG-IP pathname)

use.title: Use
use.description: BIG-IP AS3 pointer to server ssl profile

bigip.title: BIG-IP Server SSL Profile
bigip.description: Pathname of existing BIG-IP server ssl profile

IP_Intelligence_Policy.title: IP_Intelligence_Policy
IP_Intelligence_Policy.description: Configures a IP Intelligence (Dynamic White/Black List) policy

description.description: Description for the IP Intelligence Policy.

defaultLogBlacklistHitOnly.description: Specifies the default blacklist hit only logging action.

defaultLogBlacklistWhitelistHit.description: Specifies the default blacklist and whitelist hit logging action.

blacklistCategories.description: Specifies List of IP Intelligence blacklist categories with the enforcement and logging settings per category.

feedLists.description: Specifies IP Intelligence feed lists that are applied to all.

Blacklist_Categories.description: IP Intelligence blacklist categories with the enforcement and logging settings per category.

logBlacklistHitOnly.description: Specifies the default blacklist hit only logging action.

logBlacklistWhitelistHit.description: Specifies the default blacklist and whitelist hit logging action.

matchDirectionOverride.description: Specifies the source/destination IP match direction setting
